```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(igraph)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(DataCombine)
library(VennDiagram)
```

# Loading signatures

```{r}
TIL10_sig <- read.csv("TIL10_signature.csv")$GeneSymbol
MCP_counter_sig <- read.csv("MCPcounter_signature.csv")$HUGO.symbols
xCells_sig <- read.csv("xCells_signature.csv", check.names = F)[,c(3:202)] %>% c() %>% unlist() %>% unique()
NSCLC_sig <- read.csv("inputs_cbx/inputs/NSCLC.txt")$gene
Cibersort_sig <- read.csv("inputs_cbx/inputs/CIBERSORTx_ref.txt")$genes
BPRNA <- read.csv("BPRNA.csv", header = F)$V1
BPRNACan <- read.csv("BPRNACan.csv", header = F)$V1
BPRNACan3DProMet <- read.csv("Signatures.csv")$BPRNACan3DProMet %>% unique() %>% .[!.==""]

```

# Compare signatures

```{r}
Diag <- list(
  "TIL10" = TIL10_sig,
  "MCP" = MCP_counter_sig,
  "BPRNA" = BPRNA,
  "BPRNACan" = BPRNACan,
  "3D" = BPRNACan3DProMet
)

venn.diagram(Diag, "Signature_analysis.tiff")
```

```{r}
unique(BPRNACan3DProMet)
```
